description: Implement remaining scanner improvements and integrate across coderef-docs and coderef-workflow for complete ecosystem leverage

orchestrator_instructions.role: Coordinate 3 phases sequentially, validate phase gates, synthesize cross-agent results

steps.step_1: READ all agent outputs from their outputs/ subdirectories
steps.step_2: VALIDATE phase gate criteria for each phase
steps.step_3: SYNTHESIZE results into orchestrator-synthesis.md with cross-phase integration validation
steps.step_4: UPDATE session-level communication.json with phase statuses and completion

agent_instructions.role: Execute phase-specific tasks in isolated subdirectory, update communication.json incrementally

steps.step_1: READ resources/index.md to access all source documents and specifications
steps.step_2: READ your agent-specific instructions.json for detailed task breakdown
steps.step_3: Use context_json_template to create workorder in your agent home project
steps.step_4: FOR EACH TASK: Execute implementation → UPDATE communication.json task.status='complete' → REPEAT
steps.step_5: AFTER ALL TASKS: Update communication.json status='complete' with completion timestamp
steps.step_6: CREATE outputs in outputs/ directory with final results
steps.step_7: VALIDATE phase_gate_checklist - all criteria must be met before marking complete

output_template: Each agent creates markdown report in outputs/ subdirectory documenting: (1) Tasks completed, (2) Code changes made, (3) Integration points, (4) Success metrics achieved, (5) Testing results

quality_standards.completeness: All tasks in agent's phase complete, all success metrics achieved, all outputs validated
quality_standards.accuracy: Code compiles, tests pass, integration points verified, no breaking changes
quality_standards.format: Markdown reports with code snippets, metrics tables, validation results
